content: The all-time single-season threes leaderboard looks like one of those arcade game high score tables, where you just know that one kid has been playing the game ever since he could reach the controls and only refrained from filling up the entire screen out of pity. Also, I don’t know how Curry feels about Chris Paul, but the double behind-the-back to baseline jumper that put Paul on the ground was a Public Embarrassment 3 even though it was only 2 points.
